briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study Comparing Naltrexone SR/Bupropion SR and Placebo in Obese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo Controlled Study Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of Naltrexone 32 mg Sustained Release (SR)/Bupropion 360 mg Sustained Release (SR) and Placebo in Obese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

interventions.name: Naltrexone SR 32 mg/bupropion SR 360 mg/ day

summary: The purpose of this study is determine whether the combination of naltrexone SR and bupropion SR is safe and effective in treating obesity in subjects with type 2 diabetes.

primaryOutcome.measure: Co-primary: Body Weight- Mean Percent Change
